name: Burial Bandit
description:
WHO DARES TO DISTURB THE LIVING DEAD?!

Gideon Ghoul... damn him! Greedy human takes our treasures and disturbs our graves, me and me neighbors can't even get shut eye anymore! Man with shovel angered dead too long, me want to drink me sorrows away... but me can't without jaw.

Ghost, please take his foolish soul not here, but to Hell where he belong. Gideon Ghoul... YOU'RE TIME HAS COME!!!

FEATURING...

  • Intense fight or flight action without jumping!
  • Controller support (Xbox)
  • Authentic graphics and sound reminiscent of the early 1980's

CONTROLS

  • Arrow keys move; "Left" and "Right" for walking, and "Up" and "Down" for climbing ladders
  • The space bar digs a hole in the dirt, or re-fill an empty space
